name: Sorev
appearance: Willow-slim, lacquered mask-case at the hip, inked lips, and eyes that smile even when his mouth does not.
character: Clever hedonist with a conscience that peeks out in the dark; loves the theater of negotiation.
talents: Aligns debts to end feuds elegantly
Shadow puppetry that distracts a crowd
dreams: Create a mask that frees its wearer from their past
Stage a citywide truce at the Lantern Unmooring
Unmask the masked child who tips the dawn scale
secrets: Knows where the white-book is hidden
Crafted a mask for a Conclave steward to pass as a dockhand
Quietly protects children from Ledger conscription
